rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C102576

self.title: CDISC SDTM Directly Observed Therapy Location Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the physical location at which the medication or therapy was observed, by the healthcare provider, as being taken by the subject.
name: Directly Observed Therapy Location
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Directly Observed Therapy Location Terminology

terms.definition: A setting outside the clinic or a comparable health care facility, e.g. a doctor's office, the subject's home or workplace, a school, a public park, or a restaurant.
The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided.
